text: Tatiana Birshtein or Tat'yana Maksimovna Birshtein (Татья́на Макси́мовна Бирште́йн, 20 December 1928 – 23 February 2022) was a Russian molecular scientist. Birshtein's works focused in the physics of polymers. In 2007 she was given the L'Oréal-UNESCO Award for Women in Science. Birshtein died on 23 February 2022, at the age of 93.Прощаемся с Татьяной Максимовной Бирштейн ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Saint Petersburg Category:Russian physicists
title: Tatiana Birshtein
